title: Marbled almond and chocolate cheesecake
ingredients: ['340g chocolate biscuit crumbs', '50g finely chopped almonds', '50g caster sugar', '110g butter, melted', '90g plain chocolate', '450g cream cheese, softened', '200g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '450ml soured cream, room temperature']
